articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Large-scale Intensive Striking Drill of Long-range Artillery Pieces
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Large-scale Intensive Striking Drill of Long-range Artillery Pieces
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided the large-scale intensive striking drill of long-range artillery pieces of the KPA large combined units on the front for blowing up the Chongwadae and the reactionary ruling machines in Seoul.
					 The largest-ever exercise was aimed to demonstrate once again the might of the Paektusan army to bring the most miserable doom to the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors through the above-said striking action for turning into a sea of flames Seoul, the den of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors who dared stage the undisguised "precision striking drill" targeting the supreme headquarters of the Korean revolution and the office of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Involved in the drill were more than one hundred long-range artillery pieces of various calibers including the Juche artillery pieces of the elite artillery units of the large combined units on the front.
					
					 Prior to the start of the drill, General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, made a speech.
					
					 The firing drill of artillery pieces today is the one for devotedly defending the Supreme Commander and the retaliatory one of justice to demonstrate the tremendous might of the Paektusan Army to inflict the most miserable doom upon traitor Park Geun Hye, he said.
					
					 He called upon the elite artillery combatants of the large combined units on the front to make large intensive strikes with long-range artillery pieces, reflecting the faith of devotedly defending the leader and the unshakable resolution to annihilate the enemy, and thus blow up the Chongwadae and the reactionary ruling machines in Seoul bossed by the Park Geun Hye puppet group of traitors.
					
					 Kim Jong Un mounted a field observation post and received a report on the plan for the drill before issuing an order to start it.
					
					 The moment, the artillery pieces opened fire with deafening roar, fiercely pounding the imaginary targets--the Chongwadae and the puppet reactionary ruling machines in Seoul.
					
					 Watching the brave artillerymen on the front mercilessly hit the targets, he said they are very good at firing. I am pleased with their very accurate striking, he added.
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction over the successful drill, he extended the thanks of the KPA Supreme Commander to all units which participated in the drill.
					
					 He said that the KPA should prepare all service personnel as a match-for-a-hundred fighters capable of fighting actual battles by intensifying their training just as the anti-Japanese guerrillas did in Mt. Paektu and keep itself highly alerted so that it may mercilessly pound the reactionary ruling machines in Seoul, the cesspool of evils, and advance to accomplish the historic cause of national reunification, once it receives an order for attack.
					
					 Watching the drill were executive members of the KPA Committee of the WPK, commanding officers of the General Political Bureau, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and the General Staff of the KPA, commanders and political commissars of all services, corps commanders and political commissars, commanders and political commissars of artillery units, instructors of military academies at all levels and officials of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Korean-American Arrestee Interviewed in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Korean-American Arrestee Interviewed in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Tong Chol, a Korean-American who was arrested for committing hideous hostile acts and espionage against the DPRK, was interviewed in Pyongyang on March 25.
					 Present there were home and foreign journalists, staff members from embassies of different countries and missions of international bodies here, and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Kim Tong Chol has been under investigation after he was caught in the act of receiving a USB and documents with classified information of nuclear activities, military and internal reality of the DPRK contained from a fixed person in the Rason Economic and Trade Zone on October 2, 2015.
					
					 Kim told reporters:
					
					 I was born at Daebang-dong, Yongdungpho District of Seoul on August 24, 1953 and immigrated into Virginia, the U.S. at the age of nineteen.
					
					 In 2005 I moved to Yanji of China to run a trade company, and set up and had headed a company in the Rason Economic and Trade Zone of the DPRK from August 2008.
					
					 I have two daughters living in New York, U.S. and brothers in south Korea with my wife.
					
					 Living in south Korea and the U.S., I was inculcated with worship and flunkeyism to the U.S., anti-Communist idea and American sense of value to the marrow of my bones and thus came to have inveterate repugnance and ill-intended hostility toward the DPRK.
					
					 First of all, I committed a hideous crime of defiling the dignity of the supreme leadership and social system in the DPRK and engaging myself to pernicious propaganda with an aim to break the single-hearted unity of the DPRK.
					
					 I met Pae Ho Ryol, a south Korean professor at Yanbian University of Science and Technology of China, on the introduction of my American alumnus John Kim in August 2011 and since then I had got involved in the criminal acts against the DPRK.
					
					 Steeped with the hostility towards the DPRK, I willingly agreed to his proposal for common action against the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system.
					
					 Whenever I met Pae and other south Koreans on his introduction, including correspondent Ku Ja Ryong of Dong-A Ilbo in Beijing and Professor Ri Hyon U of Seoul National University, I let out a string of abuses against the dignity of the supreme leadership and the continuity of leadership in the DPRK and its policies and social system.
					
					 While running a company in the Rason Economic and Trade zone, I often spoke ill of the single-minded unity of the DPRK and deliberately spread illusions about the West.
					
					 In June last year, I let loose a spate of vituperations against the political and economic management systems of the DPRK before my employees to create antipathy against it among them.
					
					 In front of the statues of peerlessly great men, I perpetrated as rash an act as pointing a finger at the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, crying that I would commit a "suicide by disembowelment".
					
					 On the other hand, I tried to incite illusions about the U.S. and war-phobia among DPRK citizens.
					
					 I also committed such heinous crime as anti-DPRK subversion aimed to "remove" the supreme leadership of the DPRK and "bring down its social system" in collusion with south Korean intelligence agents.
					
					 Pae Ho Ryol introduced me to Ku Ja Ryong in August 2013, who presented me to Pak Ki Su, an assistant on "the policy toward the north" to the south Korean "Ministry of Unification", at a cookshop in Seoul in July 2014.
					
					 Pak Ki Su instructed me to stage all sorts of activities to "overthrow" the system in the DPRK, saying that he, as a "government" official in charge of the policy toward the north, would finance me. And he gave me handsome money including doctor's fee for my wife.
					
					 On 22 July, 2015, he gave me in Seoul a duty and money to get acquainted with high-ranking personnel of the DPRK and pump from them the policy-orientation of the supreme leadership and its will to implementation of policies, stableness of the power in the north and sentiments of those close to the supreme leadership.
					
					 And I met in Seoul with Ri Hyon U to hatch a plot for "removal" of the north's supreme leadership and "collapse of social system". Ri gave me an instruction to "spy on the state of high-ranking officials and the monolithic guidance system in the north, in particular the movements of the supreme leadership in case I attend the celebrations of the 70th anniversary of the Workers' Party as a delegate of overseas compatriots", and I agreed to his request.
					
					 I was also involved in the anti-DPRK human rights smear campaign aimed at "collapse of its social system".
					
					 In China's Yanji in August 2013 Ku Ja Ryong asked me to offer photos showing the miserable looks of poor and hungry north Koreans. So, I gave him SD containing unpleasant scenes to be rewarded.
					
					 Then, I contacted with religionists to undermine the DPRK from within through "donation" and "charity" with funds and goods provided by them to "remove" its supreme leadership and "bring down" its social system.
					
					 In August 2013 I came to contact, on the introduction of Kim Chan Yong, a U.S.-resident Korean running "Donors' Group" in Rason City, with Ri Sa Ra, a Canada-resident Korean operating a noodle factory in Hunchun of China. Ri Sa Ra asked me to offer any photo showing unpleasant looks of DPRK citizens, saying she wanted to propagandize that "the north's social system is bad." So, I intentionally took an ugly picture of my cousin's brother-in-law, who resides in North Hamgyong Province, on April 30, 2015 when he was carrying in a handcart the five noodle boxes and one bag of rice offered by me, and gave it to Ri Sa Ra for reward.
					
					 With funds of hundreds of thousands of dollars received on several occasions from a U.S.-resident Korean Ester Ju and a Canada-resident Korean Om Jae Hong, both anti-DPRK religious fanatics introduced to me by Pae Ho Ryol, I staged what is call "donation" in a bid to create illusions about religion and longing for the West.
					
					 Kim Tong Chol confessed that he was involved in a south Korean authorities-backed plot related to the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) in late March 2015 when he flew to Seoul with the help of Pak Ki Su.
					
					 At an instruction of the south Korean intelligence agency, he had systematically collected the party, state and military secrets of the DPRK, he noted, and went on to say:
					
					 In late May 2015 I offered Pak Ki Su my analysis-accompanied data on a certain unit of the Korean People's Army collected on his order of spying on the details about the unit. I also met the request for acquiring a smart phone used in the DPRK to seize its function as this helps detect the movement of the supreme leadership in the DPRK, its government maintenance way, phone-call interception, citizens' living conditions, etc.
					
					 And I offered forged anti-DPRK data to Ri Hyon U, who instructed me to gather information about such as "the supreme leadership's policy and guidelines on the people's livelihood, economic reforms, will for national reunification, monolithic ideology, political structure of power, Chinese investment in the Rason Economic and Trade Zone and troubles, enforcement of the rural sub-workteam management system and inhabitants' living conditions".
					
					 The tasks I got from Ku Ja Ryong were to collect data on the DPRK's nuclear facilities, the details of the Rason Economic and Trade Zone, photographic data on Rajin Shipyard, especially naval warships to be built at the shipyard, and find out whereabouts of a Canada-resident Korean priest Rim Hyon Su. He gave me nickname "northeastern tiger" for safe contact with him, stressing that all the tasks should be done in detail on the principles of when, where, what and how, etc. He handed some of data collected by me over to Dong-A Ilbo and other media of south Korea so that they could use them in anti-DPRK propaganda.
					
					 Kim Tong Chol made a heart-felt apology again, saying he admitted that all his crimes were committed in support of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' anti-DPRK policy and on their instructions and they are unpardonable, hideous espionages and state subversion.
					
					 Then he answered questions put by reporters.
					
					 He elaborated on the details of his arrest, his collusion with the south Korean puppet authorities, wire-pulling of the puppet and U.S. spy agencies and his direct involvement in the KIZ-related plot cooked by the south Korean authorities.
					
					 He noted that he had never been subject to such maltreatment as torture during the inquiries.
					
					 At the end of the press conference, he recommended that anyone of conscience in the world should see squarely into the essence of the U.S. and south Korean authorities' anti-DPRK policy and reject such evil policy, not joining in the disgraceful action.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Greek President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Greek President
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greeting to Prokopis Pavlopoulos, president of the Republic of Greece, on its national day.
					 The message extended warm congratulations to the president and people of Greece, wishing it development and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greeting to Abdul Hamid, president of Bangladesh, on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the Bangladeshi president success in his work for the country's prosperity, expressing the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in mutual interests.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets Bangladeshi PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets Bangladeshi PM
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Friday sent a message of greeting to Sheikh Hasina, prime minister of Bangladesh, on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would steadily develop, wishing the prime minister success in her work for the country's economic development and people's well-being.

articles.title: Anniversary of Publication Guidance Bureau Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Publication Guidance Bureau Observed
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The Publication Guidance Bureau of the DPRK observed the 70th anniversary of its foundation.
					 Established on March 26, Juche 35 (1946), the guidance bureau has grown to be an institution guiding in a uniform manner the printing, publishing and distribution of various publications over the past seven decades.
					
					 A meeting to mark the anniversary took place on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), officials and employees of the bureau.
					
					 A congratulatory message of the WPK Central Committee to the officials and employees of the bureau was conveyed there.
					
					 In the message the WPK Central Committee highly praised the officials and employees of the bureau for having made positive contributions to carrying out the sacred cause of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and building a highly civilized socialist nation of Juche.

articles.title: Steelworkers Volunteer to Join Military Operation to Liberate S. Korea
articles.content:
Steelworkers Volunteer to Join Military Operation to Liberate S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Enraged at the reckless military provocations of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors, all citizens in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have turned out in a struggle of justice to liberate the southern part of Korea.
					 As of 17:00 Friday, thousands of employees at the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex volunteered to join or rejoin the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Manager Kim Chung Gol told KCNA that most of the employees at the complex were eagerly asking for participation in the military operation to liberate the southern part of Korea.
					
					 My dream and my hope can be realized only when the disgusting group of traitors is removed from this land for good, said Sim Thae Hyok, a worker of the complex.

articles.title: 30,000 Senior Secondary School Graduates in Pyongyang Petition for Military Service
articles.content:
30,000 Senior Secondary School Graduates in Pyongyang Petition for Military Service
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The news about south Korea's Park Geun Hye group of traitors staged a "precision striking drill", aimed to destroy the office of the DPRK supreme leadership, is lashing the DPRK citizens into a great fury.
					 As of March 25, more than 30,000 senior secondary school graduates in Pyongyang have volunteered to join the Korean People's Army with a strong will to annihilate the heinous provokers.
					
					 Mun Chol, chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said that the young people's fixed resolve to show no mercy to the provokers is growing harder with the passage of time. They are ready to dedicate their lives to defending the supreme leadership of the Korean revolution, he added.
					
					 Ri Hyok Song, a student of Kang Pan Sok Senior Secondary School in Mangyongdae District, said there would be no room in this planet for anyone daring insult the supreme leadership of the DPRK. I will become a human bomb in the final battles against the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors, he declared.

articles.title: DPRK Army Ready to Launch Preemptive Attack
articles.content:
DPRK Army Ready to Launch Preemptive Attack
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of traitors in south Korea dared stage a "precision strike drill" on March 21 with 16 fighter bombers and special operation forces involved with an aim to destroy the office of the DPRK supreme leadership.
					 Such heinous provocation touched off a strong indignation against them among all the servicepersons of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 Supreme Commander of the KPA Kim Jong Un guided the large-scale intensive striking drill of long-range artillery pieces of the KPA large combined units on the front for blowing up the Chongwadae and the reactionary ruling machines in Seoul, said Jo Hong Gun, a KPA general, and went on:
					
					 The group of traitors should bear in mind that there is a limit to our patience. 
					
					 All artillery pieces are fully ready to launch a preemptive attack on those provokers. A sacred war of retaliation will begin with the downpour of fire from the Juche artillery pieces zeroing on the Chongwadae and there would be no prior warning or notice.
					
					 The enemies know well about the power of the long-range artillery and large-caliber multiple rocket launchers through the Yonphyong Island shelling incident.
					
					 Our artillery will reduce to ashes Chongwadae and other plot-breeding hangouts as well as all root causes of war, including U.S. military bases.
					
					 O Tong Chol, a KPA officer, said that all KPA servicepersons including sharpshooters are put on the highest alert.

articles.title: Production Plans for First Month of 70-day Campaign Hit
articles.content:
Production Plans for First Month of 70-day Campaign Hit
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Leading industrial establishment in the DPRK hit their production plans for the first month of the ongoing 70-day campaign.
					 According to data available, the working class in the electrical power industry carried out their daily plan at 106 percent in the first 30 days of the campaign.
					
					 In this period, collieries turned out more 200 000 tons of coal than scheduled. In particular, the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex fulfilled its plan at 117 percent on a daily average. And 13 youth shock brigades in the Tokchon Area Coal-Mining Complex accomplished their tunneling plan for the first half of the year, while over 1 000 coal miners carried out their production plan for the first half of this year and thousands of coal miners the first quarterly plans in South Phyongan Province.
					
					 Eye-catching achievements were also witnessed in metal industries.
					
					 The Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex over-fulfilled its Juche iron production plan 124 percent on a daily basis and the Chollima Steel Complex remarkably boosted the production as compared with the same period last year. 
					
					 The Jaeryong Mine hit its iron ore production plan for the 70-day campaign 103 percent in 24 days.
					
					 Signal successes were also reported from machine industries and railway transportation.
					
					 The Taean Heavy Machine Complex finished the production of generating equipment for the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3.

articles.title: Mineral Output on Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Mineral Output on Increase in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Mineral output is on sharp increase in the DPRK in the ongoing 70-day campaign to greet the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with unprecedented labor achievements.
					 The Mining and Alloying Element management bureaus under the Ministry of Mining Industry carried out the gross industrial output value for the campaign at 165 percent and 117 percent respectively as of March 24.
					
					 According to data available at the Mining Management Bureau, after the start of the campaign, the mineral output was increased 1.2 times as compared with the same period last year.
					
					 Different mass movements in the Unhung, Changdo, Unpha and other mines were conducive to the overfulfilment of their assignments for the campaign, which was led to increased production of copper, lead, zinc and barite ores.
					
					 Monthly targets were also hit by Riwon, Oil, Songchon and Sangnong mines.
					
					 The Taedonggang Battery Factory under the ministry has made such fresh successes as producing batteries necessary for the construction of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 and Hyesan-Samjiyon broad-gauge railway.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Mind Its Poor Human Rights Performance
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Mind Its Poor Human Rights Performance
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, a UN human rights expert on the basis of survey urged Japan to ban sexual abuses against the minors. 
					 Meanwhile, the UN Committee on the Elimination of Discrimination against Women expressed concern over the ceaseless distinction between the sexes of minorities including emigrant women in Japan, strongly demanding it take a legal measure to eliminate discrimination.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This proves that the international community is going to disallow sexual abuses in Japan any longer.
					
					 There are still sexual slaves of modern version in the world. It is shame of mankind.
					
					 What is more serious is that the sexual abuses in Japan have been committed at the tacit connivance of the authorities.
					
					 The abominable human rights abuses and discrimination against women have long been rampant in the society of Japan. In the last century the Japanese imperialists committed inhuman crimes related to sexual slavery, unprecedented in history.
					
					 Great irony is that Japan is pulling up other countries over their "human rights issue", not aware of where it stands at present.
					
					 Following the U.S. styling itself "human rights judge," Japan is taking the lead in pressurizing others and interfering in their internal affairs while vociferating about their "human rights issue."
					
					 Explicitly speaking, Japan is not entitled to talk about others' "human rights issue."
					
					 Japan should pay heed to its poor human rights performance sparking off concerns of the international community. This is an urgent issue facing the Japanese authorities.
					
					 Japan had better mind its own business.

articles.title: DPRK Is Sure to Win Victory in Confrontation with U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Is Sure to Win Victory in Confrontation with U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The victory of the DPRK is certain as it is led by the greatest-ever commander and its service personnel and people are turning out as one in the decisive battle with powerful military deterrent.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday asserts this in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The on-going nuclear war drills against the DPRK are adventurous moves that accelerate the self-destruction of the U.S. and south Korean puppet group of traitors as they are too much obsessed with megalomania to find a way-out. The warmongers at home and abroad talk volumes about "pressure upon the north" and "beheading operation", being oblivious of the lesson drawn from their defeat in the Korean War. This is nothing but a ridiculous behavior of repeating the history of shameful defeat.
					
					 It is not the 1950s now and gone are the days when the U.S. used to threaten and blackmail the DPRK with nuclear weapons.
					
					 The DPRK, which beat back the U.S. imperialist aggressors who boasted of being the "strongest in the world" in the Korean war, a rifle-to-A-bomb showdown, has now had access to powerful nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The DPRK gets firm in its will to achieve a final victory in the long confrontation with the U.S. by bolstering up the nuclear deterrent for self-defense now that the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet regime get more vicious in provocation.
					
					 The warmongers should not act rashly.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Must Pay Dearly for Reckless Military Maneuvers: Minju Joson
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Must Pay Dearly for Reckless Military Maneuvers: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- At the instigation of the U.S. imperialists the south Korean warmongers dared stage an outrageous "precision strike drill" aimed to destroy the office of the supreme headquarters of the DPRK on March 21 with 16 fighter bombers carrying air-to-surface guided missiles involved. This is the revelation of mental derangement of war maniacs who are making desperate efforts to remove the sun, being unaware of their doom.
					 Minju Joson Friday says this in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The "precision strike drill" revealed again that the U.S. and south Korean warmongers' saber-rattling to invade the north went beyond the extreme phase.
					
					 The south Korean warmongers have rolled up their sleeves to escalate the reckless military maneuvers at the positive instigation of the U.S. master. This is the representation of the sinister intention of the worst pro-U.S. lackeys to stifle the DPRK in collusion with outside forces at any cost. It is only natural for them to pay dearly for the maneuvers.
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the DPRK could advise the U.S. imperialists and Park Geun Hye group of traitors not to run amuck in their moves to dare hurt the supreme headquarters of the DPRK.
					
					 Those aggressors and provocateurs talking about "precision strike" will never be able to escape the fate of forlorn wandering spirits by the annihilating spirit and merciless punishment of justice of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group should always remember that what the DPRK warns is not hot air.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Regime's "Sanctions" against DPRK Bound to Go Bust: Minju Joson
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Regime's "Sanctions" against DPRK Bound to Go Bust: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. and its lackeys of south Korea held a "high-level consultation on sanctions" in Seoul.
					 There the U.S. "lavished praises" on its stooges for desperately escalating the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, copying the former's independent "sanctions" against Pyongyang while the stooges of south Korea felt grateful for its gesture and vowed to take the lead in the sanctions against the DPRK, talking about the "general will of the international community" and crying out for "stronger counteraction".
					
					 Minju Joson Friday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a ridiculous charade of the blind and a desperate fit of those fear-stricken by the dynamic advance of Juche Korea.
					
					 It was only south Korea which suffered big losses for joining in the U.S. "sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 Great irony is that the U.S. which regarded its stooges as good-for -nothing for the sake of its interests now finds itself in such a poor position as to be compelled to "exchange views" with them.
					
					 This goes to prove that the U.S.-led "sanctions" against the DPRK do not go down with the international community any longer.
					
					 No "sanctions" would work on the DPRK. The army and people of the DPRK will surely frustrate the ridiculous "sanctions" of the U.S. imperialists, their sworn enemy, and the Park Geun Hye group, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Condemns Park Geun Hye's High-handed and Arbitrary Practices
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Condemns Park Geun Hye's High-handed and Arbitrary Practices
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Voice of People on March 22 in an editorial denounced traitor Park Geun Hye's ever more high-handed and arbitrary practices.
					 The editorial disclosed that Park complained at a meeting of chief secretaries of the Chongwadae held on March 21 about a lot of things such as the passing of bills remaining at standstill due to election and the political camp and the "National Assembly" engrossed only in their own politics.
					
					 During three years of her office the gap between the poor and the rich on this land has become the most serious in Asia while the young joblessness reached an all-time high in history, the editorial noted, demanding Park make an apology to the people for this deplorable situation, to begin with, if she has face.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Protest against Anti-DPRK Confrontation Racket
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Protest against Anti-DPRK Confrontation Racket
for Achieving Peace and Reunification held a meeting on March 21 outside the building of the puppet Foreign Ministry denouncing the group of traitors for joining in the U.S. "sanctions" against the DPRK.
					 The speakers accused the authorities of discussing the ways of tightening "sanctions" against the north together with the U.S.
					
					 This is a dangerous action of escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula, they said, urging the authorities to stop at once the confrontational racket to put pressure upon the north.
					
					 On the same day, the Consultative Council of Workers in the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) staged a demonstration in Seoul in protest against the authorities' act of escalating the north-south confrontation through the shutdown of the KIZ.

articles.title: Koreans in China Slam Hostile Forces' War Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
Koreans in China Slam Hostile Forces' War Moves against DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A vice-chairperson of the Jilin Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on Tuesday hit out at the hostile forces' saber rattling against the DPRK.
					 The statement denounced the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers for staging the largest-ever war games for invading the DPRK, pulling up it over its nuclear deterrent to put an end to the hostile forces' persistent military provocations and nuclear threats that have lasted for more than half a century.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean warmongers should clearly know that all the measures taken so far by the DPRK are legitimate and fair and aboveboard ones of a sovereign state.
					
					 The DPRK remains unfazed in face of any threat and blackmail thanks to the treasured sword of Songun, though the danger of a nuclear war is increasing on the Korean peninsula due to the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills targeting the DPRK, and its army and people will surely build a thriving socialist nation true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, it stressed.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Kuwait, Guinea and DR Congo to celebrate President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun) from March 10 to 17.
					 The deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of DR Congo said that victories and successes of the DPRK would be unthinkable without the exploits of the President.
					
					 The undying feats the President performed for the country and its people and for the global independence will always be remembered not only by the Korean people but by other progressives, he stressed.
					
					 The chief for administration of a Guinean company and other speakers praised the President for working heart and soul for the country's sci-tech development.
					
					 The director of the Administrative Department of the Times Publishing House of Kuwait who doubles as chairman of the Kuwait Asian Journalist Association lauded Kim Il Sung, the founder of the Juche idea and the Songun idea, as the greatest man and sage who devoted his all to the country and its people all his life.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Finland
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Finland
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Helsinki on March 16.
					 Pekka Kotkasaari, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, and Juha Kieksi, international secretary of the Finnish Communists' League who doubles as chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Solidarity with Korean People Expressed in Guinea
articles.content:
Solidarity with Korean People Expressed in Guinea
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Events for solidarity with the Korean people were sponsored by a Guinean company on March 16 and 18.
					 Speakers blamed the U.S. for working hard to stifle the DPRK politically and economically and staging war drills against it, regarding as a thorn in the flesh the DPRK dynamically advancing along the road of socialism under the uplifted banner of independence.
					
					 Western media are hyping up "threat" from the DPRK, keeping mum about the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea should halt their annual war drills in order to ensure lasting peace on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Japanese Organization Protests against Government's Independent Sanctions against DPRK
articles.content:
Japanese Organization Protests against Government's Independent Sanctions against DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The Tokyo Ward Assemblymen's Liaison Society for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship released a statement on March 12 in protest against the Japanese government's independent sanctions against the DPRK.
					 The statement said that the independent sanctions imposed by the Japanese government on the DPRK's self-defensive H-bomb test and legitimate satellite launch greatly disappointed the Japanese people as it violated the Stockholm agreement.
					
					 It expressed deep concerns over the behavior of the government worsening the relations between the two countries.
					
					 Calling for deescalating confrontation and solving problems through dialogue, it expressed the society's determination to conduct positive activities for improving the relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Ugandan Figure Criticizes U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Ugandan Figure Criticizes U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement issued a statement on March 18 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces' Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises.
					 The chairman stated:
					
					 The Korean nation has been exposed to the constant danger of a war due to the outside forces hell-bent on the moves for aggression against the DPRK after splitting the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The joint military drills being spearheaded by the U.S. across south Korea are very dangerous as they are driving the situation on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity to the brink of a war.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to drop its hostile policy toward the DPRK, immediately stop the joint military drills with south Korea and respond to the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty in order to ensure world peace and security.

articles.title: Belarusian Body Urges U.S. to Act with Discretion
articles.content:
Belarusian Body Urges U.S. to Act with Discretion
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. should discreetly behave, bearing in mind that if it again invades the DPRK, oblivious of the bitter defeat it sustained in the past Korean war, it will never evade a nuclear disaster.
					 The National Social Federation "for the Union and Union's Communist Party" of Belarus said this in a statement on March 18.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The spiraling tensions on the Korean peninsula are utterly attributable to the U.S. policy of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is getting desperate to bring down the socialist system chosen by the Korean people themselves and to occupy the DPRK by force.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are staging the joint military exercises for invading the DPRK in collusion with south Korea.
					
					 And the they have mobilized their allies as they did in the 1950s Korean war and cooked up harsh "resolution on sanctions" to suffocate the economy of the DPRK.
					
					 The international community should raise the voices demanding the U.S. stop beefing up nuclear force and roll back its policy of aggression and making sure that Korea's reunification would be achieved by the north and the south themselves.

articles.title: DPRK's Tough Stand Supported by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Tough Stand Supported by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on March 16.
					 Recalling that the DPRK government, political parties and organizations issued the special statement in denunciation of the hideous provocation by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean group of traitors, the statement said:
					
					If the aggressors show even a slight sign of their special operations, the service personnel and people of the DPRK will determinedly rise up to devotedly defend the leader and annihilate the worst provocateurs involved in the reckless special operations such as the "beheading operation."
					
					 The DPRK has never made an empty talk.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are filled with the retaliatory will to annihilate the atrocious enemy.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean group of traitors do not halt war moves against the DPRK, they will meet ruin.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in South Africa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in South Africa
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was brought out in pamphlet by the Pretoria Copy Master Publishing House of South Africa.
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the Workers' Party of Korea is a proud course covered by it to take care of the people's destiny and lead the Korean revolution to a victory under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on March 17.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de golpe con fuegos de artilleria de unidades combinadas del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de golpe con fuegos de artilleria de unidades combinadas del EPC
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio los ejercicios de golpe con fuegos concentrados de artilleria de largo alcance de la gran unidad combinada del frente del EPC para exterminar  Chongwadae y los organos de gobernacion reaccionaria en la ciudad de Seul.
					Los presentes ejercicios organizados en gran envergadura sin precedente tienen el objetivo de mostrar una vez mas al mundo entero el poderio de las fuerzas armadas del monte Paektu determinadas a dar la mas tragica derrota a los imperialistas norteamericanos y traidores surcoreanos mediante el golpe con fuegos concentrados de artilleria de largo alcance de la gran unidad combinada del frente para convertir en un mar de fuego la ciudad de Seul, nido principal de la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye, que se atrevio a cometer el "entrenamiento de golpe con precision" a la Direccion Suprema de la Revolucion Coreana y la oficina del CC del PTC.
					
					A los ejercicios asistieron ciento y decenas de canones de diversos calibres inclusive el Juche de las unidades de artilleria selectas de la gran unidad combinada del frente.
					
					Antes de inicio de entrenamiento, el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares Pak Yong Sik pronuncio un discurso.
					
					El orador dijo que el golpe con fuegos de artilleria de hoy es una batalla de defensa a ultranza al Comandante Supremo y una justa represalia para mostrar el inagotable poderio de las fuerzas armadas del monte Paektu que daran a la traidora Park Geun-hye la mas tragica derrota.
					
					Exhorto a los participantes de los ejercicios a volar los organos de gobernacion reaccionario inclusive Chongwadae, nido de la banda de traidores titeres de Park, con el golpe de fuegos concentrados con la conviccion de defensa a ultranza al lider y el vehemente odio a los enemigos.
					
					El Mariscal subio al puesto de vigilancia de campana donde escucho el parte del plan de desarrollo de los ejercicios y dio la orden de inicio del entrenamiento.
					
					Los proyectiles golpearon concentrada e intensamente los blancos supuestos como Chongwadae y otros organos de gobernacion reaccionaria.
					
					Viendo los blancos hechos anicos por los artilleros valientes del frente, el Mariscal elogio la exactitud del golpe.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho por haber realizado con exito los ejercicios y dio agradecimiento a todas las unidades participantes en nombre del Comandante Supremo.
					
					Subrayo la necesidad de levantar mas furiosamente en el EPC el fervor de ejercicios del monte Paektu para formar a todos los militares como combatientes perfectamente dispuestos de la capacidad de guerra real, para mantener el estado muy alerto, para aniquilar sin piedad los organos de gobernacion reaccionaria en la ciudad de Seul, nido de los enemigos si les da la orden de ataque y asi lograr la causa  historica de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Vieron los ejercicios los miembros ejecutivos del Comite del PTC en el EPC, los comandantes de la Direccion Politica General, el MINFAP y el Estado Mayor General, del EPC, los comandantes y los comisarios politicos de las tropas, los jefes y los comisarios politicos de cuerpos de ejercito y de las unidades de artilleria, los profesores de las academias militares a todos niveles y los miembros del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Tong Chol, coreano residente en EE.UU., se entrevista con prensa interna y externa
articles.content:
Kim Tong Chol, coreano residente en EE.UU., se entrevista con prensa interna y externa 
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Tong Chol, coreano residente en Estados Unidos, quien fue revelado y detenido al cabo de haber perpetrado los crimenes de categoria especial y las maniobras de espia y complots contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, concedio el dia 25 en esta capital una rueda de prensa.
					Tomaron parte alli los reporteros coreanos y extranjeros, los miembros de las representaciones diplomaticas y de organizaciones internacionales acreditadas en la RPDC y compatriotas ultramarinos quienes permanecen en la patria socialista.
					
					Kim fue arrestado el 2 de octubre de 2015 en el terreno en los momentos de recibir USB y los documentos relativos con los datos secretos sobre las armas nucleares, los asuntos militares y la situacion interna de la RPDC desde un sobornado en la Zona Economica y Comercial de Rason (ZECR) y fue sometido hasta la fecha a la investigacion del organo judicial.
					
					El dijo como lo siguiente:
					
					Naci el 24 de agosto de 1953 en Daebang-dong del distrito Yongdungpho de Seul y emigre a los Estados Unidos a 19 anos de edad para vivir en el Estado de Virginia.
					
					Desde 2005 me dedique a las actividades empresariales con el rotulo de la compania comercial en Yanji, China, y desde agosto de 2008 funde una compania en la ZECR y trabaje como su director.
					
					Tengo la esposa, dos hijas quienes viven en Nueva York de EE.UU. y los hermanos en el Sur de Corea.
					
					  Me fueron inyectadas profundamente las ideas anticomunistas que rinden culto a EE.UU. y la concepcion del valor al estilo estadounidense, lo cual me hizo tener el veto constitucional a la RPDC y la hostilidad morbosa contra ella.
					
					  Mi crimen de gran tamano es primeramente que me he entregado a la propaganda demagogica destinada a calumniar e insultar la maxima dignidad y el sistema de la RPDC y destruir la unidad monolitica de este pais.
					
					  Tome este camino desde cuando mi condiscipulo norteamericano, John Kim, me presento en agosto de 2011 al surcoreano Pae Ho Ryol, profesor de la Universidad de Ciencia y Tecnologia de Yanbian de China.
					
					  Yo, cautivado completamente por la conciencia hostil a la RPDC, acepte sin vacilacion su consejo de hacer juntos las actividades contra la maxima dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC.
					
					  Cada vez que me reunia con Pae y otros surcoreanos que me fueron presentados por aquel, entre otros, Ku Ja Ryong, corresponsal del periodico surcoreano Dong-A Ilbo acreditado en Beijing, y Ri Hyon U, profesor de la Universidad de Seul, calumnie la suprema dignidad, el problema de la sucesion de direccion, las politicas y el sistema de la RPDC.
					
					  Administrando la compania en la ZECR, realice sistematicamente las actividades de propaganda para desintegrar la unidad monolitica de la RPDC y promover la ilusion sobre el mundo occidental. 
					
					En junio del ano pasado, eche maldiciones ante los empleados censurando el sistema politico y el de administracion economica de la RPDC a fin de provocarles la antipatia sobre el regimen socialista. 
					
					Insulte la maxima dignidad de la RPDC diciendo que me hare el "haraquiri" al pie de las estatuas de bronce de los grandes Lideres coreanos. 
					
					Intente crear una ilusion sobre EE.UU. y divulgar el temor a la guerra entre los habitantes de la RPDC. 
					
					El otro crimen es que perpetre en contubernio con los intrigantes surcoreanos los actos contra la RPDC tendentes a la "eliminacion" de la Direccion Suprema y el "derrocamiento del regimen norcoreano".
					
					En agosto de 2013 intime por intermedio de Pae Ho Ryol con Ku Ja Ryong y en julio de 2014 este me presento en un restaurante en Seul a Pak Ki Su, ayudante de la "politica sobre el Norte" del Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea.
					
					Pak Ki Su me dio la orden de librar toda clase de actividades para "derrocar" la RPDC diciendo que "suministrare los fondos necesarios con mi cargo de ayudante de 'politica sobre el Norte' del gobierno". A precio de esta promesa, el me dio no pocas gratificaciones incluyendo los gastos para el tratamiento de la enfermedad de mi esposa. 
					
					El 22 de julio de 2015, Pak me dio en Seul los fondos de actividades y la tarea de establecer las relaciones con altos funcionarios de la RPDC y averiguar el "rumbo de politica y la voluntad de cumplimiento de la Direccion Suprema, la dureza del Poder norcoreano y la tendencia de los funcionarios coparticipes". 
					
					En Seul me reuni con Ri Hyon U con quien hice el complot criminal para "eliminar" la Direccion Suprema y "derrocar el regimen norcoreano". 
					
					Ri Hyon U me dio la tarea de "averiguar e informar la situacion interna de los funcionarios de alto rango y el estado del sistema de unica direccion y, en particular, la tendencia de la Direccion Suprema en el caso de participar como un delegado de los compatriotas residentes en ultramar en los actos festivos por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea". 
					
					Ademas, hice los actos intrigantes de "DDHH" para "derrocar el regimen" de la RPDC.
					
					En agosto de 2013, recibi en Yanji de China la orden de Ku Ja Ryong de "enviar fotos que muestran el aspecto harapiento y hambriento de los habitantes norcoreanos". Por eso, le ofreci un SD con fotos demandadas y recibi el pago merecido. 
					
					Estableci las relaciones con los religiosos y recibi de ellos los fondos y materiales necesarios a las maniobras por la "eliminacion" de la Direccion Suprema y de "derrocamiento de sistema norcoreano". E hice todos los medios y metodos para desintegrar desde el interior la RPDC a manera de "donacion" y "caridad".
					
					En agosto de 2013, por la presentacion de Kim Chan Yong, compatriota residente en EE.UU., quien gestiona en la ciudad de Rason la empresa de "entidad de donacion", tuve vinculo con Ri Sa Ra, coreana residente en Canada, quien administra en Hunchun, China, una fabrica de fideos. Ella me pidio las fotos que muestran los aspectos pobres de los habitantes de la RPDC diciendome que "quiere hacer propaganda mal sobre el regimen del Norte". Yo satisfice su demanda y recibi el pago correspondiente.
					
					El 30 de abril de 2015, entregue 5 cajas de fideo y un saco de arroz al cunado del primo que vive en la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, tome intencionalmente la fotografia fea de el llevandolos en carretilla de mano y la entregue a Ri.
					
					En varias ocasiones, recibi cientos de miles de dolares desde Ester Ju y Om Jae Hong, compatriotas en EE.UU. y Canada, religiosos fanaticos anti-RPDC, quienes fueron presentados por Pae Ho Ryol, y realice varias "donaciones" para infundir la ilusion sobre la religion y la aspiracion al mundo occidental.
					
					Kim Tong Chol confeso que a fines de marzo de 2015 se fue por el avion preparado por Pak Ki Su a Seul donde participo en los complots de la autoridad surcoreana relacionados con el trabajo de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong.
					
					Segun la orden de los intrigantes de informacion del Sur de Corea, coleccione sistematicamente los secretos del Partido, el Estado y los asuntos militares de la RPDC y los entregue a ellos, dijo y continuo:
					
					A fines de mayo de 2015, Pak Ki Su me dio la mision de recoger los datos concretos sobre una unidad del Ejercito Popular de Corea. Entregue a el los datos coleccionados adicionando hasta los datos de analisis falsificados por mi.
					
					Me dio la orden de adquirir el telefono movil de la RPDC diciendo que si estudia su capacidad podrian prever las informaciones relativas con el movimiento de la Direccion de la RPDC, el rumbo por el mantenimiento del Poder, el metodo de interceptacion de comunicacion telefonica, la situacion de la vida de poblacion, etc. y lo cumpli. 
					
					Desde Ri Hyon U, recibi la tarea de recoger "las orientaciones y el contenido de direccion de la Direccion de la RPDC referentes a la vida del pueblo, las medidas de reforma economica, la voluntad de reunificacion, la ideologia unica y la estructura politica de la autoridad, la inversion de los chinos en la ZECR y sus dificultades, el metodo de la realizacion del sistema de pago a destajo por grupos, el estado de vida del pueblo" y otros y le ofreci los datos falsificados por mi para calumniar a la RPDC.
					
					Ku me dio los deberes de espiar los datos secretos, entre otros, los materiales relativos con las armas nucleares de la RPDC, la situacion de la ZECR, las fotos sobre un astillero y el paradero de Rim Hyon Su, pastor en Canada.
					
					  Me demando colectar detalladamente todos los datos en los principios de cuando, donde, cual, cuanto y como fabrica y que es lo que produce ahora y me enseno hasta el metodo de enlace exigiendome llamar la contrasena como "tigre del noreste".
					
					  El entrego una parte de los datos coleccionados por mi a la prensa incluyendo el periodico surcoreano Dong-A Ilbo para usarlos en la demagogia anti-RPDC.
					
					  Kim Tong Chol volvio a pedir disculpas reconociendo que todos sus crimenes son los imperdonables actos de espionaje y complots por el derrocamiento de Estado perpetrados bajo la orden de EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas adhiriendose a la hostilidad anti-RPDC de estos.
					
					  A continuacion, Kim respondio a las preguntas de los reporteros.
					
					  Se refirio en detalles al curso de su arresto por el organo competente de la RPDC, las relaciones de contubernio con los titeres surcoreanos, el control secreto de los organos de inteligencia de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea y su participacion  directa en el complot alusivo a la Zona Industrial de Kaesong inventado por los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					  Dijo que en el proceso de la averiguacion no fueron violados sus derechos humanos incluyendo un maltrato y una tortura.
					
					  Al fin subrayo que todos los conscientes del mundo no deben perpetrar los actos vergonzosos de tomar parte en la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas calando a fondo su esencia, sino rechazar tal politica del mal.

articles.title: Ejercito Popular de Corea esta dispuesto a asestar ataque preventivo despiadado
articles.content:
Ejercito Popular de Corea esta dispuesto a asestar ataque preventivo despiadado
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- La banda traidora surcoreana de Park Geun-hye cometio atrevidamente el "entrenamiento de golpe con precision" para destruir la oficina de la Direccion Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. Esta tremenda provocacion centuplica la decision del ejercito revolucionario de aniquilar a los enemigos. 
					El general del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Jo Hong Gun, se refirio a los ejercicios de golpe con fuegos concentrados de artilleria de largo alcance de la gran unidad combinada del frente del EPC para exterminar Chongwadae y los organos de gobernacion reaccionaria en la ciudad de Seul, recien desarrollados bajo la direccion del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un, y continuo:
					
					Los traidores surcoreanos movilizaron en el presente simulacro muchos aviones de combate y los efectivos de operaciones especiales tomando por blanco la Direccion Suprema de la Revolucion Coreana. Ellos deben tener presente que tiene el limite nuestra paciencia. 
					
					Nuestro ejercito revolucionario esta dispuesto a asestar el ataque preventivo despiadado. 
					
					La sagrada guerra de venganza del heroico EPC comenzara con el disparo de los canones Juche para convertir Chongwadae  en las cenizas sin advertencia previa ni algun aviso. 
					
					Los enemigos tambien conoceran bien el poderio de los canones de largo alcance y los lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados de grueso calibre, manifestado en la batalla de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong y otros incidentes. 
					
					Se acerca el momento de disparo para convertir en el mar de fuego no solo Chongwadae y otros nidos de complots fratricidas sino tambien las bases militares norteamericanas y otras fuentes de la guerra. 
					
					El oficial del EPC, O Tong Chol, dijo que estan en la disposicion perfecta los francotiradores y las unidades del frente que se incorporaran en la operacion de tempestad, la de relampago, para ocupar en un instante todas las zonas operacionales del Sur de Corea, en el momento de inicio de golpe de exterminio de la artilleria de las unidades combinadas del frente.
